BIO

Hello there! Thank you for wandering to my portfolio.
I am a 23-year-old BE student at LUT University minoring in environmental technology. Below you can see my recent and detailed working experience.

Recent working experience

LUT Admission project employee / LUT Admission projektityöntekijä

My responsibilities as a project employeeinclude reviewing master's program applications with attention to detail, managing workload effectively, and collaborating within deadlines. This position requires proficiency in academic evaluation, ability to work in a team, and delivering promptly in response to urgent demands.

City of Lappeenranta

Lappeenrannan Kaupunki

16.1.2024-6.2.2024

Head election officer / Vastaava vaalitoimitsija

In my role as head election officer during the first and second Finnish presidential elections, I led operations at a high-traffic pre-polling location. Responsible for ensuring smooth voting procedures, I provided exemplary customer service, adeptly resolved challenges, and maintained the functional integrity of the voting site. I adeptly managed several disruptive events, showcasing not only quick thinking and decisive action but also effective leadership skills.

LUT University

LUT Yliopisto

2.1.2024-7.1.2024

LUT Driver / LUT Driver-kuljettaja

As LUT Driver, my primary role involved transporting arriving exchange students from the airport or train station to their accommodations. This position demanded strong interpersonal and language skills, the ability to adapt to rapidly changing schedules at short notice, and the capacity to manage long shifts efficiently.
